articles.title: Military Parade, Mass Demonstration Mark War Victory Anniversary
articles.content:
Military Parade, Mass Demonstration Mark War Victory Anniversary
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A military parade and mass demonstration took place with splendor at Kim Il Sung Square Saturday, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, arrived at the square.
					
					 A ceremony of the KPA Ground, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force and Worker-Peasant Red Guards of Honor took place to greet him.
					
					 He mounted the tribune of honor.
					
					 Taking the tribune of honor were senior party, state and army officials, members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK and officials of armed forces organs.
					
					 Also taking it were Li Yuanchao, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-president of China, and heads of foreign delegations.
					
					 Seen at the reviewing stands were the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and delegations of overseas Koreans and other overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign delegations and delegates, diplomatic envoys of different countries and international bodies and members of the military attaches corps here.
					
					 There took place a ceremony of the combined military band entering the square.
					
					 The flag of the DPRK and the flag of the Workers' Party of Korea were hoisted at the square.
					
					 The commander of the parade units reported to the minister of the People's Armed Forces that the parade units lined up to be reviewed for the preparations of the parade celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					
					 The minister of the People's Armed Forces reported to Kim Jong Un that the parade for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war would start.
					
					 A clarion call was sounded.
					
					 A 21-gun salute boomed.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made a celebration speech to be followed by the military parade.
					
					 A column of cavalry soldiers dressed in the uniforms of the Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Army and a column of veterans in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War marched past the square in fine array.
					
					 They were followed by columns of Kang Kon Guards Second Infantry Division, Seoul Guards Third Infantry Division, Seoul Kim Chaek Guards 4th Infantry Division and other Guards divisions.
					
					 Then followed columns of the Ministry of Interior, political activists, people's guerrillas and children's guerillas during the war, Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics, Kim Jong Il University of People's Security, Kim Jong Suk Naval University and other military academies at all levels of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and women's ground, navy, air and anti-air forces.
					
					 They were followed by columns of division of party members in Pyongyang, Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, the Young Red Guards and revolutionary schools.
					
					 Columns of mechanized units marched past the square.
					
					 They included columns of artillery pieces, tanks and armored vehicles of various types, attack drones, strategic rockets and other Korean-style latest arms and equipment and ultra-precision strike means crawled through the square.
					
					 Formations of planes flew in the sky above the square.
					
					 Columns of trucks carrying officials in the field of munitions industry were driven past the square.
					
					 Mass demonstration of Pyongyangites was followed.
					
					 Flag ranks of demonstrators with huge statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il among them entered the square.
					
					 Ranks of dancers with DPRK flags, party flags, service persons' families and other people passed with floats and slogan boards bearing letters reading "July 27 of Victory", "For My Only Motherland" and "Single-hearted Unity of All Service Personnel and People".
					
					 Ranks walked past the square with a float bearing letters reading "We fought together" indicative of the fact that the victory in the war is the victory common to the Chinese people who helped the DPRK at the cost of blood under the banner of "resisting America, aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland" and the world peace-loving people.
					
					 Letters reading "Kim Il Sung", "Kim Jong Il", "Kim Jong Un", "Celebration 60", "Glory", "Iron-willed Commander", "Great Army-People Unity" and "Great Victory" and the WPK flags of the DPRK and WPK were portrayed in succession by the background stand at the square.
					
					 The combined military band changed its formation, shaping the logo of the WPK and portraying the letter reading "Defense".
					
					 Fireworks were displayed and lots of balloons were flown up to the sky.
					
					 Kim Jong Un walked to the balcony of the platform and warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of crowds.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Saturday, 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 He was accompanied by senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yong Chun and Kim Won Hong.
					
					 He entered the hall where the statues of the Generalissimos are standing.
					
					 Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also placed before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid tribute to the Generalissimos before the statues.
					
					 Then he, together with other participants, entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and made bows in humblest reverence.

articles.title: Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum Opens in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum Opens in Presence of Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum took place with splendor on Saturday.
					 The museum has turned into a center for education in the tradition of victory as they convey forever the feats the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war and the Songun revolutionary feats of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The area centering around the Monument to Victorious War has turned into a large open-air museum as it has an open-air exhibition including an exhibition of merited weapons.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, arrived at the venue of the opening ceremony.
					
					 The head of the guard of honor of the KPA Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-air Forces and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards offered a salute to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A 21-gun salute boomed.
					
					 Kim Jong Un reviewed the guard of honor and mounted the tribune of honor.
					
					 It was also taken by senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and Choe Ryong Hae.
					
					 Li Yuanchao, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-president of China, and Yu Zhenwu, former commander of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, were also present there. 
					
					 Attending at the ceremony were war veteran delegates, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, those who were received by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, heroes, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and art, public health and media, merited persons and other people in the city.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and overseas Koreans' delegations and other overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign delegations and delegates, diplomatic envoys of various countries and members of the military attaches corps here and other foreign guests.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made an opening address.
					
					 He said that the museum is an eternal treasure house for glorifying long the undying exploits Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory and the Songun revolutionary feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a hall of victory conveying to the whole world the heroic fighting spirit and feats of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who became first in defeating U.S. imperialism.
					
					 It is also a centre for education in victorious tradition and an important base for anti-U.S. class education, which makes the service personnel and people of the DPRK renew their steadfast will to invariably carry forward the history of invincibility, he added.
					
					 Then followed a march past of the guard of honor of the Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA and Worker-Peasant Red Guards.
					
					 Kim Jong Un cut off a red tape hanging in front of the sculpture "Victory".
					
					 He went round the museum together with senior party, state and army officials, the delegation of the People's Republic of China and other foreign delegations and delegates, diplomatic envoys of different countries and members of the military attaches corps here and members of the delegations of overseas compatriots. 
					
					 After looking round the museum, he expressed his satisfaction over the fact that the museum has been successfully built as a treasure house of the country, a center inspiring visitors in the confrontation with the U.S. and an important base for anti-U.S education.

articles.title: Grand Banquet Given to Mark Anniversary of War Victory in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Grand Banquet Given to Mark Anniversary of War Victory in Presence of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK gave a grand banquet at the Mokran House Saturday, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present at the banquet.
					
					 Also present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Yong Chun, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Choe Pu Il and other senior party, state and army officials, KPA commanding officers, chief secretaries of the provincial party committees, war veterans, those of meritorious services during the war and labor innovators.
					
					 A performance was given by the Moranbong Band to congratulate the anniversary of the war victory, prior to the banquet.
					
					 It began with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were instrumental music and song "Go All Out for Victory in the War", female duet and pangchang immortal masterpiece "Song of Best Wishes", light music "Mungyong Pass", female solo and pangchang "Tell, Fireworks of War Victory", instrumental music and song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", female chorus "Tribute to Victors in Great Annals" and female chorus "July 27 March".
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a speech at the banquet.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung wrought unprecedented military miracles in the world history of wars by wisely leading the army and people of the DPRK with his Juche-based military idea, superb strategy and tactics and extraordinary commanding art. These undying feats will always go down in the history of the country.
					
					 The proud history of the July 27 victory is being firmly carried forward down through generations.
					
					 The DPRK won victory after victory in the gunfire less fierce confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and fully demonstrated the dignity and might of Songun Korea as it was led by the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, an illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have firmly protected the sovereignty of the country and given a steady continuity to the history of war victory which was started in Mt. Paektu thanks to the brilliant wisdom, matchless grit and outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un invited war veterans and those of meritorious services during the war to come close to him and had a photo taken with them.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Overseas Korean War Veterans
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Overseas Korean War Veterans 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with the delegation of overseas Korean war veterans led by Kim Kang Hui, head of the veterans' group for lecture of the Chinese People's Volunteers, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday. The delegation is taking part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Greetings to Malaysian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Malaysian FM 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greeting to his Malaysian counterpart Datuk Anifah Aman on July 22 to mark the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Malaysia. 
					 Since the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries they have supported and cooperated with each other in different fields, the message said. 
					
					 It expressed belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow thanks to the joint efforts.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message on July 17 from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico and member of the Parliament.
					 The message said:
					
					 I have the honor to extend warm congratulations to you on the 60th anniversary of the heroic Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War on behalf of all members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf.
					
					 The heroic Korean People's Army and the Korean people beat back the imperialist allied forces headed by the U.S. under the wise leadership of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and won a victory in the war, thus firmly protecting the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 I, availing myself of this opportunity, express my conviction that the feats Kim Il Sung performed by winning a victory in the war and Comrade Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership exploits will shed their rays under your wise leadership and sincerely wish you great successes in your noble work for building a thriving socialist nation, achieving the peaceful reunification of the country and winning a final victory in the world socialist cause.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Saturday, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. imperialists and other invaders of its 15 satellite countries, more than 2 million-strong allied forces including the south Korean puppet army, by political and ideological, and strategic and tactical superiority and thus firmly defended the dignity and honor of the country and the nation and set a worldwide example in the struggle against imperialism and the U.S., the letter said.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il established the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism, turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power no enemy dare provoke and thus provided a treasured sword for the anti-U.S. struggle and a sure guarantee for eternal prosperity, it noted.
					
					 The undying feats Kim Il Sung performed by winning a victory in the war and the history of the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un with a steady continuity in the country, it said.
					
					 It expressed the will to always hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem and consolidate Chongryon into his overseas Koreans' organization in which the ideological and leadership systems of Juche have been firmly established by fully inheriting the ardent reverence and absolute loyalty to the Generalissimos among Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan as required by the prevailing situation and the changed situation.
					
					 It also expressed the determination to warmly love and positively aid the prospering socialist homeland and more dynamically conduct the movement for national reunification and external activities by fully displaying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received gifts from Debabrata Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and Harish Gupta, director-general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Debabrata Vishwanath and Harish Gupta conveyed the gifts to an official concerned on Friday. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un also received a floral basket and a gift from the Secretariat of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and a gift from the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Parties, Party Leaders
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Parties, Party Leaders
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received gifts from the Workers' World Party of the United States of America, the National Democratic Party of Mongolia, the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the government and foreign minister of Bangladesh, the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran, the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany, the Central Committee and general secretary of the Czechoslovak Communist Party and the chairman of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The gifts were handed to Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and an official concerned separately by the head of the delegation of the Workers' World Party of the United States of America, head of the delegation of the National Democratic Party of Mongolia, head of the delegation of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, executive president of the Central Executive Committee and member of the Standing Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, head of the delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran,  head of the delegation of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), head of the delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania, delegate of the Communist Party of Germany, head of the delegation of the Czechoslovak Communist Party and the head of the delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Guests
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received gifts from the first secretary of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action), the delegation of the Mongolian People's Party, the delegation of the Ministry of Justice of Mongolia, the delegation of the Mongolian Agriculture, Food and Environment Workers' Trade Unions and a photographer of Ria-Novosti of Russia on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Chinese, Russians in Chongjin Visit Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Chinese, Russians in Chongjin Visit Statue of Kim Il Sung 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Chinese and Russian consulates general in Chongjin visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Chongjin Saturday, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The guests laid floral baskets and flowers before the statue and made bows. 
					
					 Foreigners and Chinese people in Chongjin also laid floral baskets before the statue of Kim Il Sung on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army (KPA), people from all walks of life, school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Seen standing before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the Party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises and factories at all levels, farms, schools and others in Pyongyang. Bouquets and flowers were also placed there.
					
					 A floral basket was also laid in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Visitors paid tribute to the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Floral baskets were laid before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and the Mansudae Art Studio and mosaics portraying the smiling President and leader in other places here in the name of the units of the People's Army, institutions, enterprises and others. Bouquets and flowers were also placed there.
					
					 Servicepersons and people across the country visited statues of the President and mosaics portraying the smiling President and leader in their residential areas to pay tribute to him on the same occasion.

articles.title: People Visit Statues, Cemeteries, Memorial Towers and Graves of Martyrs
articles.content:
People Visit Statues, Cemeteries, Memorial Towers and Graves of Martyrs 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statues, cemeteries, memorial towers and graves of martyrs of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in different parts of the country on Saturday, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Present at the wreath-laying events were officials of the local party and power bodies, working people's organizations and industrial establishments, servicepersons of the KPA, people from all walks of life and students and schoolchildren. 
					
					 Wreaths were laid in the name of the local party and power bodies, working people's organizations, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, industrial establishments, farms, schools, etc. Bouquets and flowers were also laid.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the martyrs. 
					
					 They went round the statues, cemeteries, memorial towers and graves of martyrs.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Kyodo News
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Kyodo News
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Kyodo News on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The floral basket was handed to an official concerned on Saturday by Yoji Isikawa, special advisor to the Kyodo News, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. They included the president of the Women's International Democratic Federation, president of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, chairwoman of the Confederation of Brazilian Women, delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation, delegation of the Communist Youth Collectives of Spain, delegation of the Youth Federation of Mongolia, delegation of the Vietnam Women's Union and the delegation of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia".
					 The guests went round historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae with great care, being briefed on the undying revolutionary history of the President and his family in Mangyongdae.
					
					 Marcia de Campos Pereira, president of the Women's International Democratic Federation, said Mangyongdae is the holy land of revolution, adding the visit helped her get to know well how the Korean revolution was started.
					
					 Juan Nogueira Lopez who is heading the delegation of the Communist Youth Collectives of Spain noted that through the visit he deeply grasped the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and his family who devoted themselves to the revolution. The feats the family in Mangyongdae performed will shine long, he added.

articles.title: Military Paraders Welcomed by Pyongyang Citizens
articles.content:
Military Paraders Welcomed by Pyongyang Citizens
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the military parade for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War received warm welcome of Pyongyang citizens.
					 Streets extending tens of kilometers from Yonggwang Street to University Street were put on holiday attire to welcome paraders and armored vehicles.
					
					 A long procession of trucks carrying paraders left the plaza of the Pyongyang Grand Theatre led by vehicles carrying flags bearing portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Officials and workers of organs and factories of different levels and students of schools in Mangyongdae District including the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, Ministry of Urban Management, Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory and Kang Pan Sok Senior Secondary School warmly welcomed the paraders in front of Pyongyang Railway Station.
					
					 As the train of trucks entered the Chollima Street, youth and students and other people of Phyongchon District waved flowers to welcome the paraders.
					
					 Foreigners and overseas Koreans warmly applauded them in streets in front of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 The faces of the people celebrating July 27 in an elated atmosphere seemed to make paraders feel pride of glorifying the history and tradition of victory in the war under the guidance of the great party.
					
					 Workers, school children and residents in Pothonggang District extended warm welcome to paraders in Pothongmun Rotary and Hero Street, being pleased to celebrate the anniversary of the victory in war.
					
					 The paraders were overwhelmed with great excitement as they received great applauds by the masses along the route in front of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 War veterans wearing faded military uniforms with decorations all over congratulated the paraders, waving their hands. They seem to recall the days of the war when they were fighting to defend the country.
					
					 The trucks carrying with paraders passed Pipha Street and the April 25 House of Culture and the columns of mechanized units advanced amid warm welcome of masses in Sungri Street and Changjon Crossroads.
					
					 Officials and people from all walks of life in Songyo and Taedonggang districts burst into shouts of joy when they greeted unit of armored vehicles.
					
					 As the trucks entered Kaesonmun Street amid enthusiastic welcome of masses, the song "Tell, Fireworks of War Victory" played by the itinerant art squad of the Tongdaewon Aeguk Knitwear Factory resounded forth.
					
					 Teachers and students of the Kim Il Sung Higher Party School and Kim Hyong Jik University of Education shook bouquets in welcome of the paraders.
					
					 The trucks were driven past Changjon Crossroads and Okryu Bridge and headed to University Street.
					
					 The gigantic procession of military paraders along streets and the enthusiastic welcome of Pyongyang citizens demonstrated the true picture of the unshakable faith and indomitable spirit of the DPRK.

articles.title: Fireworks Gala Marks Anniversary of Victory in FLW
articles.content:
Fireworks Gala Marks Anniversary of Victory in FLW
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Fireworks gala "We will always emerge victorious!" took place here on Saturday, 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (FLW).
					 Various parts of the city centering around the bank of the River Pothong where the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Tower stands were crowded with service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and people from all walks of life who gathered to watch fireworks of jubilation and joy.
					
					 Supreme Commander of the KPA Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, appeared in the outdoor auditorium.
					
					 Watching them were senior officials of the party, state and army, war veteran delegates, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, bereaved families of martyrs, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, merited persons and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates of various countries, diplomatic envoys of various countries and members of military attaches here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Among those present there were the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan and other delegations of overseas compatriots and other compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, made a speech.
					
					 He said the fireworks to be displayed in the nocturnal sky of Songun Korea represent the boundless reverence of all the service personnel and people for the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who defeated the U.S. imperialist aggressors, led the showdown with the U.S. to victory after victory and protected the destiny of the country, nation and socialism.
					
					 As soon as the start of the gala was declared, fireworks were displayed in the sky above the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum to the tune of the song "Our July 27".
					
					 Kaleidoscopic fireworks displayed one after another beautifully decorated the nocturnal sky.
					
					 Amid the playing of "Song of National Defence", fireworks were displayed on either side of the theme statue "Victory" of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower, brightly lighting Kim Jong Un's immortal autographic letters "Tribute to The Great Years."
					
					 Beautiful fireworks were displayed to the tune of the songs "Our General Is the Best" and "Might of Korea," gorgeously adorning the nocturnal sky in July. 
					
					 The gala reached its climax when multi-color fireworks were displayed to the tune of the songs "Forward to the Final Victory" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives".
					
					 It reflected the glory the service personnel and people of the DPRK extended to Kim Jong Un who is adding shine to the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to victory and the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The service personnel and people who enjoyed the gala were overwhelmed with the immense pleasure and happiness of watching the significant fireworks gala in the presence of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Receptions Given on War Victory Day
articles.content:
Receptions Given on War Victory Day 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Receptions were given by the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at Okryu and Chongryu restaurants on Saturday, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					  Present there senior party, state and army officials including Kim Yong Nam and Pak Pong Ju, chairperson of a friendly party, war veteran delegates and officials of the party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the delegation of the People's Republic of China and other foreign delegations and delegates, foreign guests, delegations of overseas compatriots, compatriots abroad and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam and Pak Pong Ju made speeches there.
					
					 The speakers said that the immortal exploits the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war would go down in the history of the country as he worked unprecedented military miracles in the world history of war.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The Korean people have won victory after victory in fierce confrontation with the U.S. imperialists without gunfire and demonstrated the dignity and might of Songun Korea before the whole world as they held the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					 They have firmly protected the sovereignty of the country and immensely glorified the history of war victory under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will finally conclude the confrontation with the U.S. in the same spirit as our army and people defended the country in the 1950s and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, long-cherished desire of the nation, they concluded.
					
					 On the same day similar receptions were given in each city (district) and county.

articles.title: DPRK Order Awarded to Chinese, Russian War Veterans
articles.content:
DPRK Order Awarded to Chinese, Russian War Veterans 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Order Commemorating the 60th Anniversary of the Victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was awarded to war veterans of the Chinese People's Volunteers with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday. 
					 Present at the awarding ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pyon In Son, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, officers of the Korean People's Army, officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, war veterans of the Chinese People's Volunteers participating in the celebrations of the 60th war victory anniversary and staff members of the Chinese embassy here including diplomatic minister Tian Baozhen.
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly was read out. The order was awarded to 33 war veterans of the Chinese People's Volunteers including Yu Zhenwu, former commander of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, who displayed noble internationalism in the war and made contributions to the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and China.
					
					 And 10 members of the delegation of Russian Korean War veterans led by Ya. V. Kanov, vice-chairman of the Korean War Veterans' Council of Russia, also received the order. They displayed noble internationalism during the war and made contributions to development of the DPRK-Russia friendly relations.

articles.title: Evening of Fireworks Held in Kaesong
articles.content:
Evening of Fireworks Held in Kaesong 
 Kaesong, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kaesong City's evening of fireworks took place on Saturday, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 At the beginning of the fireworks event, dexterous outbursts of fire made the letters "Jonsung" and "7. 27" in the nocturnal sky. 
					
					 Enjoying the fireworks, people impressively recalled the undying exploits of the peerlessly great persons who shattered the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists, and won victories only in the standoff with the imperialists and the U.S.
					
					 The fireworks made the audience cherish deep in their mind the conviction that rosy is the future of the army and people of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward a final victory, holding the dear respected Kim Jong Un in high esteem. 
					
					 The evening of fireworks showed well the fixed will of the army and people of the DPRK to eternally glorify the feats the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war and the Songun revolutionary feats of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and inherit the ever-victorious history and tradition under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Mark War Victory Day
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Mark War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Nampho Port Saturday, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Nampho City and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 Captains and crewmen of the Panamanian-flagged ship Plain Sailing and Dongfeng took part in the meeting. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Speakers said that under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists, protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and encouraging the struggle of the world revolutionary people. 
					
					 The great exploits Kim Il Sung performed by winning the victory in the war are steadfastly carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, they said, adding:
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people will as ever win victory after victory in the standoff with the U.S. and achieve national reunification. 
					
					 A congratulatory letter to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Art Performance, Dancing Party of Service Personnel Given at Panmunjom
articles.content:
Art Performance, Dancing Party of Service Personnel Given at Panmunjom
						
 Panmunjom, July 27 (KCNA) -- An art performance and dancing party of service personnel of the Korean People's Army took place at the plaza outside the hall at Panmunjom where the Armistice Agreement was signed to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Earlier to the events, KPA general officer Ryo Chol Ung said that the great victory in the war was a shining fruition of the wise leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung. He called on all the service personnel to glorify the ever-victorious history and tradition with powerful arms.
					
					 The art performance began with chorus "July 27 March". Put on the stage were colorful numbers like narrative and poem "Shine Long, Great Feats in War Victory", serial wartime songs "Song of National Defence" and "To a Decisive Battle", mixed chorus "We Have Won" and small chorus "Footsteps".
					
					 The performers praised the Generalissimos for defeating the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, setting the shining example of building the revolutionary armed forces in the era of independence and developing the Korean People's Army into to the elite force of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Mixed chorus "Let Us Meet at the Front", female solo "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms", chorus "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" and other numbers showed well the fixed will of the service personnel to stamp out the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean traitors.
					
					 The dancing party began with song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung". The participants presented the sea of dancers.
					
					 Songs like "Our Dear Supreme Commander" and "We Will Forever Stand Guard over Sea of Homeland" added to the mood of the dancing party as they reflected the indomitable spirit of the service personnel to win a final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Slogans and songs reflecting the fixed will of the service personnel to display fireworks of victory in the grand struggle for national reunification reverberated far and wide in the sky above Panmunjom.

articles.title: War Victory Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
War Victory Day Observed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has celebrated the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War with splendor.
					 Working people, youth and students across the country held colorful celebration events.
					
					 People from all walks of life visited the statues and beaming images of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in various places including Pyongyang and each provincial seat.
					
					 They visited revolutionary sites where the Supreme Command was situated in the period of the war.
					
					 Concerts marking the war victory day took place at theatres in Pyongyang.
					
					 Concert "July 27 of Eternal Victory" was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre and the revolutionary drama "Following the Banner of Victory" was performed at the National Theatrical Theatre.
					
					 The art performance "Our July 27 is eternal as there is the dear respected Marshal" was given at Hamhung Square by at least 10 000 school youth and children and people.
					
					 An art performance was given by people and school youth and children in Kaesong City.
					
					 Performances celebrating the war victory day took place at the Sepho tableland reclamation site, the Orangchon Power Station construction site and others by shock brigade members and officials and members of the women's union in North Hamgyong Province. They sang wartime songs and other songs reflecting boundless reverence for the illustrious commanders.
					
					 Officials of province-level organs in Jagang Province presented a wartime song performance stage and warmly congratulated war veterans who bravely fought against the enemies in the days of war for the sake of the party and the leader, the country and people.
					
					 Celebration performances and wartime song performances were given in provinces including North Phyongan, South and North Hwanghae, Kangwon and Ryanggang provinces, and the people in the cities and counties of South Phyongan Province played sports contests, spending the day of the war victory.
					
					 Youth and students across the country significantly decorated the victory day with dancing parties.

articles.title: Myth of U.S. "Mightiness" Shattered to Smithereens
articles.content:
Myth of U.S. "Mightiness" Shattered to Smithereens
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953) fought against the U.S. invaders. 
					 For the U.S., it was the first time in history to suffer a defeat in wars.
					
					 Clark, the then commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East and commander of the "UN Forces", who signed the Korean Armistice Agreement on July 27, 1953, said that the war was a failure for the U.S.
					
					 For about 130 years after its appearance, the U.S. staged over 110 aggression wars, with 8 900 military interventions.
					
					 But the myth of U.S. "mightiness" was shattered to smithereens in the war against the two-year-old DPRK.
					
					 In the war, the U.S. mobilized two million troops and introduced huge latest combat equipment, including 73 million tons of munitions.
					
					 The U.S. brasshats vouched that they would round off the Korean War in 72 hours.
					
					 However, the vouching was replaced by the signing of the Armistice Agreement, which was made three years after the outbreak of the war.
					
					 U.S. high-ranking officials confessed that the U.S. was not as strong as others thought.
					
					 The myth of mightiness was created by the DPRK, not by the U.S.

articles.title: Koreans in Russia Celebrate War Victory Day
articles.content:
Koreans in Russia Celebrate War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- There took place an event of Koreans in the Maritime Territory of the Russian Federation in Nakhodka on Thursday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 On display in the venue of the event were photos documenting the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed by winning a victory in the war and photos on the signal feats the peerlessly great men performed by bolstering up the defense capabilities and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the President and his reminiscences "With the Century" and other books on his greatness.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before a full-length picture of Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il on Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the event. 
					
					 Speakers said that the Korean people could win a victory in the war thanks to the ever-victorious strategy and outstanding leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The great victory in the war was a historic event which defended the dignity of the nation and paved an avenue for carving out a new life, they noted.
					
					 As the revolutionary idea and undying feats of Kim Il Sung were creditably carried forward by Kim Jong Il, socialist Korea is winning victory after victory in confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and registering brilliant achievements in building an economic power under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, they said.
					
					 The lifelong idea and desires of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will surely come true and the DPRK will demonstrate its might as a reunified powerful nation thanks to Kim Jong Un, they stressed.
					
					 They said that all the Koreans in the Maritime Territory would deeply cherish the feats of the Generalissimos and devote themselves to the patriotic work for national reunification.
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "Provoker of Korean War".

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory Marked Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They included a photo and book exhibition in Romania, a meeting and film show in Mongolia and round-table talks in France on July 22.
					
					 On display at the venues were photos showing exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and photos showing the invincible might of Songun Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union said:
					
					 HE Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK, beat back the invasion by the U.S. imperialists with his outstanding military idea, strategy, tactics and war methods, and brought about a great victory. 
					
					 Through the exhibition the visitors will get to know better about the proud tradition of the Korean people who registered victory under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the situation of the DPRK which has worked fresh miracles thanks to the pluck and guts of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party of Mongolia said only victory will be in store for the Korean people led by the peerlessly brilliant commander.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the France-Korea Friendship Association and other speakers vehemently denounced the U.S. as chief architect of escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula as it has ceaselessly staged moves targeting the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from its bitter defeat in the 1950s.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted in the events in Romania and Mongolia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits in War Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits in War Praised by Foreign Newspapers
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of various countries dedicated special write-ups to the 60th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The July 22nd issue of the Mongolian newspaper Zuuny Medee carried an article titled "An iron-willed commander" illustrated with a photo of smiling President Kim Il Sung and photos documenting the revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The article said that it is a miracle unknown in history that the young DPRK won a victory in the confrontation with the allied forces of the U.S. which boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, troops of 15 countries following it, the south Korean puppet army and remnants of the Imperial Japanese Army. It went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea, wrought such a memorable military miracle.
					
					 The result of the Korean war proved that the U.S. "mightiness" was no more than a mirage and its military technological power was not almighty.
					
					 Clark, who signed the Armistice Agreement, the first of its kind in the U.S. history, confessed that the north Korean army achieved success thanks to the skilled command by General Kim Il Sung, and Gomes, former president of Portugal, said that he came to know that Kim Il Sung was a gifted strategist and great commander, the only one in the world.
					
					 The July 19th issue of the Ugandan newspaper Sun Rise carried an article titled "Day of Korean people's victory" illustrated with a photo of the smiling President. The article stressed that it is the fixed stand of the DPRK that if the U.S. imperialists ignite a new war, it will stamp them out so that not a single man will be left to sign the surrender document.
					
					 The July 18th issue of the Thai newspaper Xing San Daily and the July 19th issue of the Bangladeshi newspaper The Daily Folk in their special write-ups titled "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "60 years ago, an event that startled the world" praised the President for bringing about the beginning of a downhill turn for U.S. imperialism for the first time in history.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats in War Victory Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats in War Victory Praised by Foreigners
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Figures of Myanmar and Pakistan issued statements on July 20 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Aung Thein Lynn, member of the Central Executive Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, said that President Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialsits in one generation and built a powerful socialist Korea. He went on:
					
					 The President was a prominent leader and iron-willed brilliant commander who achieved undying feats for the happiness and prosperity of the Korean people and the cause of the world progressive people for independence.
					
					 The heroic Korean people converted the DPRK into an invincible socialist power of independence, self-support and self-reliance under the wise leadership of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Today the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who has successfully carried forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, is wisely leading the party, army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 We express full support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation and realize the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Shahida WiJarat, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, emphasized that the great victory of the Korean people is a fruition of Kim Il Sung's seasoned art of command, iron will, matchless grit and devotion to the people.

articles.title: DPRK Team Beats Its Chinese Rival 1:0
articles.content:
DPRK Team Beats Its Chinese Rival 1:0
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A match took place between the DPRK and Chinese teams on Saturday for the 2013 East Asian Cup.
					 The DPRK female football team had the last match after beating its south Korean rival 2:1 and tying its Japanese rival 0:0.
					
					 DPRK player Ri Un Hyang scored a goal by heading at around 1 minute in the first half of the match. The DPRK team beat its Chinese rival 1:0.
					
					 The DPRK team placed the first at the contest for its highest scores.
					
					 DPRK player Kim Un Ju received the best player and Ho Un Byol the top scorer.

articles.title: Papers Mark War Victory Day
articles.content:
Papers Mark War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of the DPRK editorially mark the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung was a historic event that provided a landmark for an epochal turn in hewing out the destiny of the country and the nation and accomplishing the human cause of independence. 
					
					 The victory in the Korean War helped the world look up to Kim Il Sung as the greatest commander and the DPRK has demonstrated its might as heroic Korea which brought about the beginning of ruin for the U.S. imperialists for the first time in history, the paper says, and continues:
					
					 The DPRK's victory in the war was a shining result of the Juche-oriented military idea, strategy and tactics and outstanding commanding art of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The victory was attributable to the strong spirit for defending the country and popular heroism of the service personnel and people of the DPRK united close around Kim Il Sung.
					
					 His exploits for the war victory are unprecedented in history for their rich contents, profundity and influence on the development of the times and history. As they won a victory in the war, the army and people of the DPRK honorably defended the sovereignty of the nation and gains of revolution they achieved in the anti-Japanese armed struggle and paved a wide avenue of building socialism. They have immensely strengthened the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks centering on the leader, ushered in the era of a new swing in the struggle against imperialism and the U.S. and firmly defended global peace and security. Herein lies the great historic significance of the victory in the war. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the undying feats of Kim Il Sung who made great contributions to the cause of independence of the country and the people and the human cause of independence will shine forever.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Drop Its Confrontation Idea
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Drop Its Confrontation Idea 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has unsuccessfully strived to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty for several decades since the ceasefire. It is because of the U.S. outdated confrontation idea. Minju Joson Saturday says this in a commentary. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Owing to the U.S. confrontation policy, the Korean Peninsula has seen the repetition of the vicious cycle of confrontation and detente. 
					
					 It is the U.S. intention to retrieve the defeat it suffered in the 1950s by igniting a new war on the peninsula. 
					
					 This is the reason that the U.S. has denied the just demand of the DPRK to immediately dismantle the ghost-like "UN Command" which has no justification to exist. 
					
					 The confrontation policy will only bring a war and it will not benefit the U.S., either.
					
					 Now is the 21st century. The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have grown stronger in quality incomparable with that in the 1950s and the DPRK has strong power enough to smash any aggression by the enemies at one stroke. 
					
					 It is as foolish as playing a life-risking gamble for the U.S. to try to stand in showdown with the DPRK which has emerged as a world-level political, ideological and military power. 
					
					 The U.S. should clearly see who its rival is and opt for respecting the sovereignty of the DPRK. 
					
					 If the U.S. is true in its claim that it wishes for peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and has no intent to oppose the DPRK, it should, first of all, respond to the DPRK's demand for dismantling the "UN Command", military mechanism for aggression of the DPRK, to prove itself. 
					
					 When the U.S. assures us in practice of its intent not to pursue hostility towards the DPRK, it will come out for confidence-building. 
					
					 The U.S. should clearly know that it can expect nothing from the DPRK with its confrontation idea of the Cold War era, and boldly make a correct decision.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Accused of Blocking Investigation into IS
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Accused of Blocking Investigation into IS 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Internet paper Voice of People carried an article on July 23 denouncing the "Saenuri Party" for obstructing the investigation into the Intelligence Service (IS).
					 The article recalled that the Emergency Situation Council to Denounce IS's Interference in "Presidential Election" for Political Operation which consists of at least 200 civic and social organizations proposed a 100 000-people candlelight rally in August.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The state investigation into the IS's meddling in the election is expected to be over by August 15, but this remains in stalemate due to the obstructions of the party.
					
					 The conservative ruling forces are working hard to bury the investigation into oblivion while dragging it on.
					
					 The party agreed to make a state investigation into the case under the pressure of public opinion critical of the IS and the mounting actions of people from all walks of life demanding the punishment of those involved in the case.
					
					 The people will never step back till a thoroughgoing probe is made into truth and those involved in the case are punished.
					
					 The political camp, too, should keenly feel the people's anger at the violation of democracy.

articles.title: Japan's Policy of Discrimination against Korean Students in Japan under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Policy of Discrimination against Korean Students in Japan under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Consultative Council for Implementing Declaration of Citizens of south Korea and Japan and the Volunteers Corps Institute in south Korea held a rally at Kyunghui University in Seoul on Wednesday denouncing the Japanese government for pursuing a policy of discrimination against Korean students in Japan.
					 A special resolution was adopted at the rally.
					
					 It condemned Japan for totally excluding Korean schools only from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					
					 Korean students in Japan were born and are growing in Japan, it said, adding this is attributable to the Japanese colonial rule. It went on:
					
					 It is the first step for the liquidation of the past for Japan to guarantee the Koreans in Japan the right to national education.
					
					 The United Nations pointed out that it is a clear discrimination to exclude Korean schools only from the above-said program in violation of the covenant on social rights, covenant on the right to freedom, the treaty on the rights of the children and the treaty on the abolition of the racial discrimination and other international laws. It strongly recommended the Japanese government to rectify this.
					
					 The resolution urged the Japanese government to apply the program to Korean schools and all local self-governing bodies to lift the suspension of the payment of subsidies to Korean schools.
					
					 Then followed speeches by those concerned of legal circles and civic organizations staging actions for abolishing the discrimination against the Korean schools.
					
					 Speakers said the Japanese government has long resorted to the moves for stamping out Korean schools such as the step for closing and confiscating Korean schools in 1948 and the fabrication of "the bill on foreigners schools" in the latter half of the 1960s.
					
					 They warned Japan not to forget its historic responsibility.
					
					 They slammed Japan for failing to make sincere repentance of the war of aggression, far from being grateful for the development Japanese society made at present by learning from politics, economy and culture of Korea.

articles.title: Magazine Paektu-Halla of Koreans in China Issued
articles.content:
Magazine Paektu-Halla of Koreans in China Issued 
						
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the July issue of its magazine Paektu-Halla.
					 The magazine carried a photo of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung waving back to the cheers of service personnel and people.
					
					 It also carried Marshal Kim Jong Un's historic appeal "Let Us Usher in a Fresh Heyday on All the Fronts of Socialist Construction by Creating the 'Speed on Masik Pass'".
					
					 Seen there were poems "Mounting stairs of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun", "Extraordinary leadership which brought about victory in the Fatherland Liberation War", "Warm welcome to 60th anniversary of the victory in the war" and "Fireworks of victory" on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					
					 Edited there were articles titled "The general and CNC(13)", "Under care of the benevolent country", "We will give continuity to June 15 era of reunification" and "Let's live in spirit of 'By our nation itself'".
					
					 It carried an answer given by the spokesman for the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities for their criminal allurement and abduction operations against DPRK citizens and flesh traffic, open questionnaires released by the General Association of Koreans in China slamming the south Korean puppet regime for derailing the dialogue  between authorities of the north and the south and news of actions staged in south Korea in protest against the Intelligence Service's interference in the election.
					
					 The magazine also introduced world news.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house of Myanmar.
					 The work, a speech made by him at the parade for celebrating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A releasing ceremony of the work was held at the publishing house on July 23.

articles.title: Tienen lugar desfile militar y manifestacion por 60o aniversario de victoria en guerra
articles.content:
Tienen lugar desfile militar y manifestacion por 60o aniversario de victoria en guerra
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar solemnemente el dia 27 en la capitalina Plaza Kim Il Sung el desfile militar y la manifestacion de pyongyaneses por el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953).
					Llego a la plaza el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Tuvo lugar la ceremonia de recepcion de la Guardia de Honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y el Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino.
					
					　Salio el Mariscal a la tribuna de la plaza.
					
					Lo hicieron tambien Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los miembros de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, los secretarios responsables del Comite del PTC en las provincias y los funcionarios de las instituciones de fuerzas armadas.
					
					Tambien aparecieron Li Yuanchao, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y vicepresidente de la Republica Popular China, y los jefes de las delegaciones de varios paises.
					
					En el area de invitados figuraban las delegaciones de los coreanos residentes en ultramar inclusive el grupo de felicitacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon, los compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista (FDNA) en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados las delegaciones y delegados extranjeros, los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los integrantes del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Se inicio la ceremonia de entrada de la banda militar combinada.
					
					Fueron izadas la bandera de la RPDC y la otra del PTC.
					
					El comandante de las unidades de desfile militar informo al ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares que las unidades de desfile se pusieron en fila para la revista.
					
					El ministro de las FAP dio parte al Mariscal sobre el inicio del desfile militar.
					
					Al sonar el trompeteo de inicio de desfile, se dispararon 21 salvas.
					
					El vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, pronuncio el discurso de la ocasion y se inicio el desfile militar. 
					
					Entro primero en la plaza la columna de caballeria del periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa, seguida del convoy de veteranos de la pasada guerra. 
					
					Se desfilaron seguidamente la Segunda Division Guardia de Infanteria Kang Kon, la Tercera Division Guardia de Infanteria "Seul", la Cuarta Division Guardia de Infanteria "Seul" Kim Chaek y otras columnas de divisiones guardias. 
					
					Marcharon a pasos firmes las formaciones de los oficiales del Ministerio del Interior, activistas politicos, guerrilleros populares, miembros de Guardia Infantil y de Guerrilla Infantil. 
					
					Tambien marcharon las columnas de las academias militares a todos los niveles del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, incluso la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung y la Academia Militar Politica Kim Il Sung, la Universidad de Seguridad del Pueblo Kim Jong Il y la Academia de Fuerzas Navales Kim Jong Suk.
					
					Detras de los bloques femeninos de fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas, pasaron los de la division de militantes del partido de la ciudad de Pyongyang, el Instituto Superior de Industria Ligera Han Tok Su de Pyongyang, la Guardia Juvenil Roja y las Escuelas Revolucionarias.
					
					En seguida, se inicio la marcha de las columnas motorizadas. 
					
					Pasaron por delante de la tribuna el convoy de exploradores, francotiradores e infantes paracaidistas, seguido de los canones de diferentes calibres, tanques y los carros blindados. 
					
					Entraron las columnas de aviones sin piloto, cohetes estrategicos y otros armamentos modernos y medios de ataque de alta precision al estilo coreano y las escuadrillas de aviones.
					
					Hizo aparicion en la plaza el convoy de los funcionarios de la rama de industria belica. 
					
					Acto seguido, comenzo la manifestacion de pyongyaneses. 
					
					Entraron en la plaza las filas de banderas con las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Se veian las filas con las banderas nacionales de Corea y del partido, la fila de familias militares y las otras de distintos sectores que rodeaban las carrozas con letreros "27 de julio de la victoria", "Por la unica patria", "Unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo" y portaban las pancartas.
					
					Pasaron los manifestantes que acompanaban la carroza con el letrero "luchamos juntos" como senal de que la victoria en la guerra coreana es la comun del pueblo chino, que ayudo a la RPDC derramando sangre bajo la bandera de "resistir a los yanquis, ayudar a Corea, y defender el hogar y el pais propios", y de los pueblos amantes de la paz del mundo. 
					
					Se inscribian mientras tanto en la plaza las letras como "Kim Il Sung", "Kim Jong Il", "Kim Jong Un", "Celebracion del 60o aniversario", "Gloria", "Comandante de acero", "Gran unidad monolitica entre el ejercito y el pueblo", "Gran victoria" y otras y la bandera nacional de la RPDC y la del PTC.
					
					Terminada la manifestacion, la banda militar dibujo con el cambio de formaciones el emblema del Partido y escribio la letra "defensa". 
					
					Volvieron a tirarse los fuegos artificiales y volaron los globos de goma. 
					
					El Mariscal salio al balcon de la tribuna y respondio con su mano levantada a las aclamaciones de la multitud.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en el dia de victoria en guerra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en el dia de victoria en guerra
						
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia 27 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Won Hong y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					El Mariscal entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalisimos. 
					
					Fue colocado ahi un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal. 
					
					Tambien fue depositado un cesto de flores en nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC. 
					
					El Mariscal rindio homenaje con sus acompanantes a los Generalisimos ante las estatuas y se dirigio a los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados los cuerpos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					En ambos salones, el volvio a rendirles homenaje a los Generalisimos con sus acompanantes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un asiste al banquete por el dia de victoria en guerra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un asiste al banquete por el dia de victoria en guerra 
						
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- La Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecieron el dia 27 en la Casa Mokran un banquete opiparo con motivo del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					Asistio a la ocasion el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del PTC, Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Participaron tambien Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Yong Chun, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Choe Pu Il y otros cuadros directivo del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los comandantes del EPC, los secretarios responsables del Comite del PTC en las provincias, los veteranos de guerra, benemeritos del tiempo de guerra e innovadores laborales.
					
					Tuvo lugar primero la funcion de la banda Moranbong por el dia de victoria.
					
					En la escena, iniciada con la interpretacion del Himno Nacional, se presentaron la musica de instrumentos y la cancion "Todas las fuerzas por la victoria en la guerra", el duo femenino y Pangchang de la "Cancion de la bendicion", imperecedera obra clasica, la musica ligera "Paso de montana Mungyong", la musica de instrumentos y canciones en serie de las peliculas sobre la guerra, el solo femenino y Pangchang "!Cuenten, fuegos artificiales de la victoria!", el quinteto femenino "En el manantial", la musica de instrumentos y cancion "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!" y los coros femeninos "Fiesta de la gran victoria en la Guerra", "Tributo a los vencedores de la gran epoca" y "Marcha del 27 de julio".
					
					En la ocasion, el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, pronuncio el discurso.
					
					El orador dijo que brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria las inmortales hazanas por la victoria en guerra del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien al organizar y dirigir sabiamente al ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC con su autoctona idea militar, estrategia y tacticas excepcionales y arte de mando extraordinario, creo el milagro militar sin precedente en la historia mundial de guerras. 
					
					Agrego que la orgullosa historia del 27 de julio continua con firmeza de siglo en siglo y generacion tras generacion.
					
					Bajo la guia del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il, comandante insigne del Paektu, hemos alcanzado victorias siempre en el arduo enfrentamiento sin detonaciones con el imperialismo norteamericano, exaltando asi a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la Corea del Songun, recordo.
					
					Anadio que hoy dia, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, que cuentan con la perspicacia genial, la audaz incomparable y la direccion destacada del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, defienden con firmeza la soberania de la patria y continuan la historia de victoria en la guerra, iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					El Mariscal tomo una foto de recuerdo con los veteranos de guerra y los benemeritos del tiempo de guerra, asistentes a la recepcion.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de veteranos coreanos en ultramar
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de veteranos coreanos en ultramar
						
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 27 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae en el ambiente fraternal con la delegacion de veteranos coreanos de guerra en ultramar presidida por el jefe del grupo de conferenciantes veteranos del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino Kim Kang Hui, que participa en las festividades del 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.

articles.title: Ofrecidos banquetes por 60o aniversario de victoria en guerra coreana
articles.content:
Ofrecidos banquetes por 60o aniversario de victoria en guerra coreana
						
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- La Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecieron el dia 27 en el Restaurante Okryu y el de Chongryu el banquete en conmemoracion del 60o aniversario de la gran victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					A la comida fueron invitados participantes en las festividades por esa efemeride.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los delegados de veteranos de guerra y los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, entidades de trabajadores,  ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					Tambien fueron invitados las delegaciones y delegados de varios paises incluida la delegacion de la Republica Popular China, los huespedes extranjeros, los compatriotas y sus delegaciones, asi como el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					En el banquete hicieron uso de la palabra Kim Yong Nam y Pak Pong Ju.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que brillaran eternamente en la historia de la patria las inmortales hazanas realizadas por el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung quien creo los milagros militares nunca vistos en la historia de la guerra del mundo.
					
					Subrayaron que al contar con el Generalisimo Kim Jong Il el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos lograron victoria tras victoria en la confrontacion con el imperialismo yanqui y manifestaron la dignidad y el poderio de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Anadieron que bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un se defiende firmemente la soberania del pais y se continua la historia de  victoria en la guerra.
					
					Destacaron la necesidad de liquidar cuenta total de la confrontacion antiyanqui con el espiritu de defensa de la patria de la decada de 1950 y lograr a toda costa la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria, anhelo de la nacion.
					
					El mismo dia, se ofrecieron los banquetes por esa efemeride en todas las ciudades (municipios) y los distritos.

articles.title: Otorgada Orden Conmemorativa a veteranos chinos y rusos
articles.content:
Otorgada Orden Conmemorativa a veteranos chinos y rusos 
						
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Fue otorgada la Orden Conmemorativa del 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria a los veteranos del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 27 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de otorgamiento. 
					
					Asistieron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Pyon In Son, los oficiales del EPC, los funcionarios interesados, los veteranos del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino que toman parte en los actos festivos por el 60o aniversario del triunfo en la pasada guerra coreana y el consul Tian Baozhen y otros miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					Se dio lectura al decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y fue otorgada la orden a los 33 veteranos del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chinos incluso el ex ex comandante de las fuerza aereas del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China, Yu Zhenwu, quienes en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria pusieron de pleno manifiesto el noble espiritu internacionalista y contribuyeron al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre Corea y China. 
					
					Tambien fue otorgada la misma orden a 10 miembros de la delegacion de veteranos rusos de guerra coreana encabezada por el vicepresidente del Consejo Ruso de Veteranos de la Guerra Coreana, Ya. V. Kanov, quienes manifestaron el noble espiritu internacionalista e hicieron aporte al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre Corea y Rusia.

articles.title: Premier coreano envia mensaje de condolencias al presidente espanol
articles.content:
Premier coreano envia mensaje de condolencias al presidente espanol
						
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que recientemente, en Espana ocurrio una gran perdida humana por el accidente de tren, el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, envio el dia 26 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente del gobierno espanol Mariano Rajoy Brey.
					El mensaje expresa a las victimas y sus familias profunda simpatia y condolencias y desea al gobierno del Reino de Espana que liquide lo mas pronto posible las consecuencias del accidente.
